name: Nosferatu
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.Regeneration: The nosferatu regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight. If the nosferatu takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function until the start of the nosferatu's next turn.
traits.Spider Climb: The nosferatu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
traits.Sunlight Hypersensitivity: The nosferatu takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
